SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILDREN_REGISTER
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to register a set of children
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILDREN_REGISTER ( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The list of children to register @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier) -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields
as begin
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try update dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION set REGISTRATIONDATE = @currentDate, FUNDED = 1, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = USR_CHILDEXTENSION.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
end
